definitions.definition: A construction in or around a harbour designed to break the force of the sea and to provide shelter for vessels lying inside.
A low bulkhead across the forecastle deck of a ship which diverts water breaking over the bows into the scuppers .
A wooden or concrete barrier , usually perpendicular to the shore , intended to prevent the movement of sand along a coast.

main_definition: A construction in or around a harbour designed to break the force of the sea and to provide shelter for vessels lying inside.
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) A low bulkhead across the forecastle deck of a ship which diverts water breaking over the bows into the scuppers .
( on beaches ) A wooden or concrete barrier , usually perpendicular to the shore , intended to prevent the movement of sand along a coast.
